programme.title: Golden Disc Awards

programme.desc: Welcome to the Golden Disc Awards! Prepare to be dazzled by a constellation of girl group performances. Iconic performers will light up the stage with their captivating choreography, powerful vocals, and undeniable star power. Don't miss this celebration of K-pop's brightest talents at the Golden Disc Awards!
